Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE
Name: Goblet
Description: Goblet with relatively high walls, simple lip and an ovoid base. The exterior of the vase is covered with a thick golden mica slip, the so-called ''golden ware'' typical of the Second Cataract region and Classic Kerma.
